VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing AetherNet Sports relative to StarburstTV?
SRP.A: AetherNet Sports is {below} StarburstTV in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing StarburstTV relative to AetherNet Sports?
SRP.A: StarburstTV is {above} AetherNet Sports in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Luminara Play relative to StarburstTV?
SRP.A: Luminara Play is {below} StarburstTV in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total streaming views?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {NovaStream Live}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total streaming views?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {EchoWave Entertainment}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Luminara Play's maximum Streaming Views in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Luminara Play's maximum Streaming Views is in {2005}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is AetherNet Sports's minimum Streaming Views in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: AetherNet Sports's minimum Streaming Views is in {1996}.

NC.Q: Between 1993 and 2005, did the total Streaming Views experience a larger or smaller change than between 1992 and 2000?
NC.A: The change in total streaming views between 1993 and 2005 was {larger} than between 1992 and 2000.

NC.Q: Between 1987 and 1992, did the total Streaming Views experience a larger or smaller change than between 1995 and 1999?
NC.A: The change in total streaming views between 1987 and 1992 was {smaller} than between 1995 and 1999.

NC.Q: Between 1998 and 2003, did the total Streaming Views experience a larger or smaller change than between 1995 and 2004?
NC.A: The change in total streaming views between 1998 and 2003 was {smaller} than between 1995 and 2004.

NC.Q: Between 1989 and 2002, did the total Streaming Views experience a larger or smaller change than between 1992 and 2002?
NC.A: The change in total streaming views between 1989 and 2002 was {smaller} than between 1992 and 2002.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Luminara Play} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did StarburstTV and NovaStream Live first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: StarburstTV and NovaStream Live first exchanged leading positions in {1987}.
